import React from 'react'; import Logo from "./img/logo.png"; import Menu from "./img/menu-alt.png"; import MessagesPage from './MessagesPage'; import Home from './Home'; import Profil from './Profil'; import Friends from './Friends'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Logout from './Logout' export default class NavBarHome extends React.Component{ setDisConnected = () => { alert("Vous êtes déconnectés !"); } render(){ return

    • Messages
    • Friends
} }
